other_tests.findings: Moderate amount of ascitic fluid (approximately 1 liter) and huge polycystic ovaries.
Bilateral multilocular ovarian masses and ascites during the first pregnancy and enlarged multilocular ovaries measuring 14 cm in length during the fifth pregnancy.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The size of the ovaries remained enlarged throughout the pregnancy.

other_tests.findings: Enlarged ovaries and ascites during the fourth pregnancy.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Despite a resection of a large ovarian wedge (500 g) bilaterally during the first laparotomy, enlarged ovaries (15 cm in length) were found on laparotomy during the subsequent pregnancy.

findings.estradiol: Exceeded the upper limit of normal range during the first trimester, stabilized within normal range during the second trimester, and increased further during the third trimester.
findings.inhibin B: Markedly and inappropriately elevated, later declined in parallel with the chorionic gonadotropin level.
findings.total testosterone: Moderate increase due to increase in sex hormone-binding globulin, free testosterone was normal.

other_tests.changes_over_time: The level of inhibin B declined in parallel with the chorionic gonadotropin level, while estradiol levels changed significantly over trimesters.
